description: Allows to change a form of a Polish first name and family name to a different grammar case. It can be useful in automated generation of messages that use people's names.

packOptions.summary: Flection helper for names and surnames in Polish language
tags: polish, name, first, given, surname, forename, flection, nominative, genitive, odmiana, imiona, imion, polskie, mianownik, dopelniacz
